desc: Central Chic is showcasing some of the prettiest evening shawls, boleros, cardigans, capes, scarves, bags and party accessories. Central Chic adds the finishing touch to your formal dress with glamour & style!

layout.text:
Spring-Summer 2022 is set to be the biggest year of weddings & celebrations.
Central Chic has your special event covered with our stunning ranges of wedding shawls, wraps, pashminas, boleros & cardigans.
